description: This file configures Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) policies for a Flask web application. It provides functions to parse allowed origins from environment variables and to set up CORS with either restricted or permissive settings based on environment configuration.

methods.name: Optional[List[str]] parse_cors_allowed_origins(value: Optional[str])
methods.description: Parses the CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS environment variable into a list of allowed origins, handling comma-separated values and whitespace trimming.

methods.name: configure_cors(app)
methods.description: Configures Flask-CORS for the provided Flask app based on the CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS environment variable, allowing all origins if the variable is unset.
